name: Stackbuilder
tagline: StackBuilder is a simple palletization software (packing, palettization, truck load of homogeneous load stacking).
body:
![StackBuilder Icon](http://www.treedim.com/images/PLMStackbuilder_icon.png) **StackBuilder**
=============

StackBuilder is a simple palettization software (homogeneous case stacking).

It helps you to solve some problems like :
* palettization : define a case and a pallet then find the best layout to stack the case,
* case filling : define a primary packaging and a case or a set of cases then find the best case and the best way to fill it,
* truck load : select a paletizing solution then optimize the truck/container load,
* optimal case search : given a box, a number of box per case and a pallet type, find the optimal case layout and dimensions.

![Case and Pallet Optimization](http://www.treedim.com/images/PLM_Stackbuilder_2.png)

Generate a custimazed report :
![Automatic Analysis Report](http://www.treedim.com/images/PLM_Stackbuilder_rapport.png)

**StackBuilder 2.0 is available:**

[Download the last release here](https://github.com/treeDiM/StackBuilder/releases)

This new version of palletizing software StackBuilder brings many new features: such as packing flat cartons, adding corners, pallet cover, protective film. The user interface has also been redesigned to provide better interactivity.

TreeDiM The team would like to thank the many users of the StackBuilder community, who helped direct the software to a powerful and simple tool to use.
![StackBuilder 2.0](http://www.treedim.com/images/stackbuilder2_01.png)

![Palletization](http://download-codeplex.sec.s-msft.com/Download?ProjectName=stackbuilder&DownloadId=1423649)

**Warning :** StackBuilder can not handle heterogeneous problems such as:
* palletizing with several case types,
* producing solutions that do not rely on layers,
